availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Madison County, Kentucky, physician. Jessamine County, Kentucky, native. Born c1820. Married to Drucilla Ham Jackson on October 13, 1853. Physician in 1850. Physician in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jessamine County, First Division, p. 20
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Madison County, Western Subdivision # 2, pp. 95-96
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jessamine County, District #2, p.4
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records, Microfilm (1852-1910). Microfilm rolls #994027-994058. Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives, Frankfort, Kentucky. p. 3 of microfilm
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Madison County Marriages, Film #000183302, p.235 of microfilm
